definition: the immediate rebroadcast of some action (especially sports action) that has been recorded on videotape, play again
details:
noun
- the immediate rebroadcast of some action (especially sports action) that has been recorded on videotape
= synonyms: instant replay, action replay
- something (especially a game) that is played again
= synonyms: rematch
verb
- play again
= example: play again
- repeat a game against the same opponent
= example: repeat a game against the same opponent
- play (a melody) again
- reproduce a recording on a recorder
= example: reproduce a recording on a recorder
= synonyms: play back
